div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

title.value: Denial Reasons - Reason codes used to interpret the adjudication denial reason. The Value Set is a combination of two Code Systems: X12 Claim Adjustment Reason Codes (CARC) and CMS Remittance Advice Remark Codes (RARC)

description.value: Reason codes used to interpret the adjudication denial reason. RARC codes are available at http://www.wpc-edi.com/reference/codelists/healthcare/remittance-advice-remark-codes.

copyright.value: CARC codes are owned, maintained and distributed by X12. Use of X12 codes require licenses. RARC codes are owned by CMS and are available for use.
